## ğŸš€ Deployment

### Quick Deploy (All Platforms)
```bash
cd apps/
./deploy-all.sh
```

### Individual Platforms
```bash
# Web App (Vercel)
cd apps/web-app && vercel --prod

# Mobile App (Android APK)
cd apps/mobile-app && eas build -p android

# T-Deck Hardware (ESP32)
cd apps/t-deck-app && pio run --target upload
```

## ğŸ“ Migration Guide

No migration needed - all new features!

To start using:
1. Pull latest code
2. Install dependencies: `pip install -r requirements.txt`
3. Run tests: `pytest tests/`
4. Deploy apps: See `/apps/DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md`
